author: Terry L
title: Great Location and service
text:
We recently stayed here on a trip to London to see an Arsenal game.
The location was superb, only a minutes walk from Angel tube station.
On arrival we had the added bonus of the Arsenal team arriving for a team lunch at the hotel. Despite the arrival of the team the attention to detail was second to none as were checked in quickly and without any issue despite arriving before stated check in time due to flight arrival time.
We had access to the lounge which is small compared to other Hilton lounges we have frequented and is rather exposed at the front entrance to hotel, unusual positioning for an executive lounge.
The room was decent in size and clean throughout.
The Hotel is just off Upper Street which gives great access to a plethora of bars and restaurants available.
We walked to the Arsenal game at the Emirates Stadium which is only around 25minutes away but we stopped in pubs along the way.
When we arrived back to our room the hotel had left a birthday cake and a bottle of wine for me to enjoy. Overall great service, great location and would definitely stay again for my next Arsenal trip.
